skills.name: Drake's Swiftness
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a 30% Decrease SPD debuff for 2 turns. Also has a 30% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 15%.

effects.notes: Single hit. 20% chance Decrease SPD, 30% chance Decrease TM.

skills.book_value: Valuable: increased damage and proc chance when booked; A1 is considered useful for TM control.
skills.notes: Good anti-turn-meter tool vs bosses that rely on single big turns.

skills.name: Wingbeat Flurry
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of placing a Stun debuff for 1 turn.

effects.notes: AoE, 2 hits. 20% chance Stun per hit.

skills.book_value: High: booking improves proc rates and reduces cooldown at higher book levels; core CC ability.
skills.notes: Strong crowd-control A2; synergises with ACC and stun-focused masteries/sets.

skills.name: Phoenix Rite
skills.description: Revives an ally with 50% HP and places a 50% Ally Protection buff on them for 2 turns.
skills.book_value: High: book to reduce cooldown and increase usability in long fights.
skills.notes: Excellent emergency tool; ally protection reduces immediate follow-up wipes.

skills.name: Boundless Life
skills.description: Heals all allies by 10% of their MAX HP at the start of each turn. Also places a 30% Increase SPD buff on a random ally for 2 turns.
skills.notes: Extremely powerful passive for sustain and team speed; benefits greatly from Relentless/extra-turn sets.
